entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon then changing to 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
